calc_dic module¶

calc_dic.TA(co2aq, pH, solve_value=0)[source]¶

Calculate total alkalinity(TA) given aqueous co2 concentration (co2aq) and pH. solve_value is used when one tries to solve for co2aq or pH given TA value (enter targeting TA value for solve_value).

Parameters

  • co2aq (float) – Aqueous co2 concentration

  • pH (float) – pH value

  • solve_value (float) – Target TA value when using solvers from scipy.optimize

Return type

float

Returns

TA value

calc_dic.TA_pH_wrapper(co2aq, solve_value=0)[source]¶

A function wrapper used when using newton_krylov solver solving for pH given co2aq and TA, which doesn’t take additional arguments

Parameters

  • co2aq (float) – Aqueous co2 concentration

  • solve_value (float) – Target TA value when using solvers from scipy.optimize

Return type

func

Returns

a function used for newton_krylov solver to solve for pH, given co2aq and solve_value (TA concentration) value

Note

Here is an example

TA_val=0.2
co2aq=0.0035
pH_measured=8
pH_func = TA_pH_wrapper(co2aq,solve_value = TA_val)
pH_theory = newton_krylov(pH_func,8)
pH_theory

>> array(7.69814971)
calc_dic.calc_DIC(total_df, echem_time_df, gas_change_time_df, outgas_shift=20, volume=0.01)[source]¶

Calculates DIC TA, DIC eq, pH theory,eqand DIC theory,eq, given the echem_gas_dataframe(total_df) , echem_time_df, which tells the start and end of each echem process, gas_change_time_df, which tells when atmosphere CO2 is changed, and the volume of the electrolyte in L.

Values in State 3’i are calculaed based on initially measured pH (pH measured at state 3’i), pCO2, and assuming gas-solution equilibrium (co2aq=pCO2*0.035(Henry’s constant)) Other states’ values are calculated given TA, and using other functions in this module.

outgas_shift is necessary when the timing data in gas_change_df and echem_time_df are off by some time (usually within 30 seconds).

Parameters

  • total_df (pd.DataFrame) – A pandas dataframe, created by utils.merge_echem_gas_df() function, that contains echem and gas information

  • echem_time_df (pd.DataFrame) – A pandas dataframe, created by echem_method.find_time_period() function, that contains the timing of the start and end of each echem process

  • gas_change_time_df (pd.DataFrame) – A pandas dataframe, created by ‘gas_methods.find_gas_change_time()’ function, that contains the timing of when atmosphere CO2 is changed

  • outgas_shift (int) – Time in seconds. Offsets inaccurate timing in echem_time_df or gas_change_time_df

  • volume (float) – Volume in litre. The volume of the electrolyte

Return type

pd.DataFrame

Returns

A dataset that contains DIC TA, DIC eq, pH theory,eqand DIC theory,eqfor state 3’i, 1, 1’, 3 and 3’f for each cycle.

dataset[‘Cycle’] -> (int): The cycle number

dataset[‘State’] -> (string): The state name, ranging from 3’i, 1, 1’, 3 and 3’f

dataset[‘pH_measured’] -> (float): The measured pH value

dataset[‘pH_theory’] -> (float): The theoretical pH value given pCO2 and TA

dataset[‘TA’] -> (float): The total alkalinity concentration in Molar

dataset[‘DIC_TA’] -> (float): DIC TAvalue in Molar. DIC value calculated based on TA and measured pH, assuming no crossover of non-conservative ions. dataset[‘DIC_eq’] -> (float): DIC eqvalue in Molar. DIC value calculated based on measured pH and assuming gas-solution equilibrium, i.e. co2aq = pCO2*0.035 (Henry’s constant) dataset[‘DIC_theory’] -> (float): DIC theory,eqvalue in Molar. DIC value calculated based on TA and theoretical pH. dataset[‘index’] -> (int): The index in total_df where each of the above value is calculated.

calc_dic.co32(co2aq, pH, solve_value=0)[source]¶

Calculate carbonate concentration given aqueous co2 concentration (co2aq) and pH. solve_value is used when one tries to solve for co2aq or pH given carbonate concentration value (enter targeting carbonate concentration for solve_value).

Parameters

  • co2aq (float) – Aqueous co2 concentration

  • pH (float) – pH value

  • solve_value (float) – Target carbonate concentration value when using solvers from scipy.optimize

Return type

float

Returns

carbonate concentration

Calculate DIC given aqueous co2 concentration (co2aq) and pH. solve_value is used when one tries to solve for co2aq or pH given DIC value (enter targeting DIC value for solve_value).

Parameters

  • co2aq (float) – Aqueous co2 concentration

  • pH (float) – pH value

  • solve_value (float) – Target DIC value when using solvers from scipy.optimize

Return type

float

Returns

DIC value

calc_dic.hco3(co2aq, pH, solve_value=0)[source]¶

Calculate bicarbonate concentration given aqueous co2 concentration (co2aq) and pH. solve_value is used when one tries to solve for co2aq or pH given bicarbonate concentration value (enter targeting bicarbonate concentration for solve_value).

Parameters

  • co2aq (float) – Aqueous co2 concentration

  • pH (float) – pH value

  • solve_value (float) – Target bicarbonate concentration value when using solvers from scipy.optimize

Return type

float

Returns

bicarbonate concentration
